name: http-hello-world
description: A WebAssembly Component that responds to HTTP requests using the `wasi:http` WIT interface

scripts.build: npm run build:tsc && npm run build:wasm
scripts.install: npm run build && rm -rf ../../client/testfixture/scripts/*.wasm && cp ./dist/http-hello-world.wasm client/testfixture/scripts/
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run wadm:start
scripts.reload: npm run build && npm run wadm:stop && npm run wadm:start
